comment: Professor Lucas was GREAT!!!  She explains everything so well, and is more than willing to answer questions if you have them. My bf and I both had her and are terrible at math, but we both did extremely well because of her! Project big part of grade, and tests aren't too hard if you study and do the homework. Overall, A+++++ professor!  TAKE HER!!!

Teaches at a level the 8th graders would understand.  She let's you know what to expect on tests and quizzes, gives just enough homework to make sure you understand the material.  An "A" should not be a problem.

I really hate math, and I was dreading taking Stat.  This was the Stat professor for me.  She explains very well and teaches off powerpoints which she posts online.  She does not burden you down with homework, but she gives enough to help you understand and learn the material. Just go to class and do all the homework. Great professor!

The best math teacher I have ever had. I dreaded taking stats but was surprised how simple she made it. I ended with a very high B. If she says she'll roll it up if you are close she won't. I only missed one class. Take her if you have a chance. Great teacher.
Best class ever! I went out of my regular schedule just so I could take her. She is extremely helpful and gives you practice for each test. Final is not accumalative. Take this class!

Awesome awesome Professor. I've struggled with MAths all my life and this professor finally broke the Math curse on me. She is extremely helpful and goes step by step until students understand. She will even make time after class to help. Take her she and you guranteed to pass with minimum B.
Great teacher. I struggle with math so that is why i put a 3, she is a great teacher and willing to go the extra mile and help you if you ask her.

Prof. Lucas is one of the best professors I have ever had! When I would look at an upcoming chapter I had zero idea how to do anything. But she teaches this material in a way that is easy to understand and reatain! Take her is you have the chance!

Professor L, is an amazing professor. A++++. Take her if you want to take an easy class. She will help you as much as she can. Her class is easy. With four test and four quizzes!! EASY A! Professor Lucas, your the BEST!!!!!!!

Prof Lucas, is a great professor. If you want an 'A' take her! She is helpful and makes Statistics EASY!!!! She is very nice, and is there for any help. There are 4 test and a project that is easy. The test and quizzes are easy.

She is so nice and so helpful. She will do anything she can to help. Class is a little boring but only because she wants to make sure everyone understands the material. If you do well on the homework you will do great on the tests. She also doesn't make you buy the stats portal so buy the book used if you can.
Do not choose another professor for 1107!  This one is the absolute best!  I only wish she taught other STAT classes!  Professor Lucas if you ever read these - can you make that happen?

Professor Lucas is so sweet and is the best Statistics Prof! The first day I was worried, but after the first class this class was amazing! If you don't take her, you are dumb. She will help you anytime and always answer your questions. If you don't show up to class, this class can be hard. If you want an A  take her, you will not regret it. A++++
If you do the homework and don't sleep during class, you will pass with an A.

I went into this class with major math anxiety, but at the beginning of the first day of class I had no worries. She is the best Math teacher at KSU hands down.There is a little excel involved for the project, but don't worry if you are not familiar with the software she will guide you through it. Easy "A" without the stress.

She is one of the best math professors I've ever had. If you don't excel at math, such as myself, and have to take a math course as a general requirement, I highly recommend her. I actually understood the material, and learned things. She is a very nice and pleasant person. She wants students to succeed. She explains things clearly,and is helpful.

This professor is one of the best professors I have ever had. She truely cares about the students understanding what she is teaching. She will not move on until everyone understands. Unfortunately this can slow the class down. But she is passionate about this class. She is so easy to understand. If you need Statistics this should be your professor.

She is awesome. Great professor. I haven't done any kind of math in 7 years and she made everything so easy to learn. Loved her.. Also  she is very nice. There was one excel project 4 tests, some quizzes, and homework. Not that bad though. I definitely recommend. Wish all professors were like her:)

Ms. Lucas is brilliant and extremely helpful to all her students.  Although I found the material quite easy (due to working w/ like material in job for several years) she took the time to explain to those that weren't up to speed.  One project (handed in in 2 phases) several quizzes (drops lowest) and short homework assignments.  Highly recommend!

Best teacher I have ever had in my life!  She is so great about explaining everything so everyone understands it before moving on.  Easy A!  Few homework assignments, a 2-part project, quizzes and exams are all that is graded.  Gives some opportunities for extra credit.  I highly recommend her to anyone who takes Math Stats!!!

Really nice and really easy teacher.  She will keep teaching until you understand it.  If you are good at math, you will probably be bored in this class.  I skipped class pretty often and still got a A+ in the class.

BEST MATH TEACHER EVER! love love love her. she helped so much and i would recommend this teacher to everyone! attendance is not mandatory, she accepts somethings late if necessary, gives AWESOME powerpoints! BEST TEACHER BY FAR

This is the best profssor for Math anyone could have! She explains everything very well. She does occasionally take attendance. Only used book for homework but sometimes she will post the homework on Georgia View so don't buy the book right away. There is 1 project that has 3 phases, around 8 quizes, Three exams and the 3rd exam is the final.
Best math teacher I have ever had. She is so sweet and explains things very well and more than once.

Great professor!! I was involved in a car accident and she took time out of her schedule to meet me at school and teach me the material that i missed. She wants you to ask questions because she actually cares. They're many professors who don't care but she does. The tests were a little tricky but just study and you'll be fine.
statistics was easy with Ms. Lucas.  She is an incredibly sweet teacher that was very willing to help everyone.

Mrs. Lucas is the best math teacher! She's very patient and soft spoken. She takes her time making sure everyone in the class is comfortable with and understands the material before she moves on to the next chapter! After taking this class with her, I realize Statistics wasn't nearly as hard as other people told me it would be! TAKE HER CLASS!

Prof Lucas is the best math teacher I have ever had.  This was round 2 for me in this class and the difference in teaching is like night and day.  I would recommend her to ANYONE!!!  Statistics is not as scary as some of the other professors make it out to be!

I am not good at math at all.  Prof. Lucas is one of the best teachers I have ever seen.  She truly wants you to do good and understand the material.  She cares about every student in the class and does not get frustrated at all with questions.  Take her she is WONDEFUL!!!
Great teacher. Will go over a concept 100 times, 100 different ways until you understand. TAKE HER!

AWESOME! Very soft spoken which could be good or bad but overall great professor. Homework and test are a breeze. Spends most of the time getting students to understand rather than rushing through a lesson.

Prof. Lucas has to be, by far, the BEST teacher I have ever had. Math is not my favorite subject, but when I tell you, it gets no better than this, believe me! For those of you that did not give this course a chance(Summer/MW 5-7:45p)and dropped it, you're crazy!! You should have stuck it out long enough to realize that this woman is awesome!!!

Professor Lucas is an extremely nice lady. I am terrible at Math and I made an A in her course. She goes out of her way to explain difficult concepts and does not try to trick her students. I highly recommend her!

The easiest course I have ever had as an undergrad. Everything is in the book, THEN she adds supplementary notes. Very easy project divided into 3 phases, 3 tests, plus h/w. H/w is very easy. If you hate math, have never taken math, or get bored easily, take this course. I promise you there is no easier STAT course. Dr. Lucas is great! Very clear.

Finally...a teacher who knows how to teach and who is not ego driven.  I am a math dimwit and I actually have learned to understand Stats and enjoy it because of this instructor.  She does make it extremely simple, so if you are a math genius, this class may be boring for you.  For those of you math challenged..I HIGHLY recommend this instructor.

Okay, seriously, I know she only has a couple reviews, but trust me, if you can't do math, you need to take this woman. Stats DOES NOT GET EASIER THAN THIS. You will pass with flying colors.  She's very basic and friendly. Easy A.

AMAZING teacher! everyone told me stat was so hard so i was worried. it was so easy. it wasn't that the class was just easy she is an amazing teacher she made concepts SO easy to understand. All around best teacher i have ever had and so sweet and caring! take her or your dumb!
Very great professor! Patient, friendly and very approachable.  Always willing to work with the class.  I would definitely take her class!

Had her for Intro Stats. Very nice, patient lady. Not an exciting class, but very easy. Her presentations are clear and easy to understand. She only assigns enough homework for you to understand what you need to know. She's great for people who don't like math/don't remember much from algebra and other math courses. Easy tests/quizzes.
